alfredsnippet.snippet:
#! /bin/bash

# How to bootstrap an automation script:
#  Start with asking the user to complete all tasks/steps.
#  Gradually replace steps with actual automation, as nessesary

echo -n "--> Please do step 1 "
read

echo -n "--> Please do step 2 "
read

echo “Finished”
alfredsnippet.name: bash automation script
